title: Path to installed headers in sandia_hand_driver are not correct

content.raw:
If I try to include the header files from the sandia_hand_driver package, I will get compiler errors since the headers include themselves, but with an incorrect path. 

Many of them #include<sandia_hand/filename.h> 

but they should actually be #include<sandia_hand_driver/sandia_hand/filename.h> 

It actually looks to me that they should probably not be installed to the "sandia_hand" subfolder of "sandia_hand_driver" and then the includes would look like #include<sandia_hand_driver/filename.h>"
